author: Paul Rankin
method: Place the coconut milk, spring onion and lemongrass into a small saucepan and bring to a gentle simmer.  Add the salmon and cook for 1-2 minutes. Stir in the coriander, salt and freshly ground black pepper  Serve straightaway poured into a soup bowl.
